reviewText: A great fresh look at the pacific war
Good action movie. Love the old war movies.
Good combat footage, but limited to a few battles and not comprehensive.  There could be a number of reasons for this.

This would have been 5 stars except the  volume levels  were so high you could not hear the veteran interviews.  The background sound effects ruined the program for me. The entire point of the show was hearing what the veterans had to say, but many times I could not.
Can't say enough about this remarkable series.  But the scenes of death and horror should cause anyone to rethink war.
I always like good documentary that shows one how things were done in the past.  Sometimes those past ideas can be used in todays business
This is a decent WWII video offering. The images are stock and the commentary likewise but it holds enough information to be a reasonable time expenditure for the interested.
This is a very nice CLEAR film of the progress and victory in the pacific theater.  It was Very nice!
Interesting topic with good footage, but narration is overpowered by sound effects.
Another awesome historic film about WWII air power.
this is mostly footage that is available elsewhere.
An excellent series of films that focus on the fighter planes and their pilots, from all sides of World War II.
It was alright to watch.  It was good view of air combat during WWII.
